Death Hound Amulet Smithing

Shadowblade001

version 1.00


INTRODUCTION
In addition to my Death Hound Metal Smithing mod, which allows the Dovahkiin to craft weapons from Death Hound Metal Alloy, this mod allows Amulets to be crafted from Death Hound Fine Alloy.


**REQUIRES DAWNGUARD**



*PLEASE NOTE*
As with my other mods, this is not a texture, mesh and beautification mod, it is just a crafting mod. Therefore, although the items look different to others in the game they are not especially beautiful to look at or highly different from Vanilla items, nor are they unique. They are just a different colour and have some special properties.



DESCRIPTION
Some sages believe that while the smelting of death hound collars and mixing with iron ore allows the resulting alloy to be crafted into weapon grade metal, so an admixture of silver allows the resultant alloy to be malleable enough to be carefully crafted into fine metal chains and amulets.

It is speculated that as silver is inimical to Undead, this precious metal is what renders the Death Hound collar metal unable to harm the wielder, while still allowing a remnant of protection from Frost damage.

Similarly, the Dunmer metallurgist Derenni Brenylas speculates that the addition of cold iron instead of silver, which is also inimical to Daedra and Undead in some mythologies, allows the metal to be used for weapons and inflict additional, semi-magickal damage on the target while not harming the wielder of the weapon.



CRAFTING
The ability to smelt Death Hound Fine Alloy from the collars and one piece of silver ore appears at the smelter if you have minimum skills scores of:

Smithing 30, Steel Smithing Perk
Enchanting 30, Enchanter Perk 1 rank

The recipes to craft Death Hound Amulets appear at the forge under Jewellery and have the same requirements as smelting the alloy.

ENCHANTING
Despite having an innate magickal Frost Resistance effect, these Amulets can be enchanted with two other effects as normal if you have the required skills and perks.


WHY NO RINGS AND CIRCLETS?
Wow! Over-powered Munchkin Much?


COMPATIBILITY
This mod is compatible with Death Hound Metal Smithing and is also a "Stand Alone" mod and so will work either with or without the other mod.


Death Hound Metal Smithing is available from [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/41259]here[/url].


This mod contains unique recipes and items and so cannot conflict with other smithing and crafting mods.

This mod contains seven simple scripts which only allow the OnEquipped effects of a hidden perk attached to the Amulets to be used. They are completely safe.



INSTALLATION
Unzip the download and copy the entire contents of the top _shb_DH_AmuletSmithing folder into your Skyrim folder, which by default is usually:

....Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim

Let Windows add _shb_DH_AmuletSmithing.esp and the contents of the Meshes, Textures and Scripts folders to the Data folder.


UNINSTALLATION
To uninstall, make sure any Death Hound Amulets are unequipped and save the game.

Delete the _shb_DH_AmuletSmithing.esp, any folders starting with _shb_DH_Amulet and the script and source files beginning with _shb_DH_Amulet.


~.~
